Convenience function for reporting informative messages and warnings. Deprecated. Use info() instead.

Parameters:

Variable Documentation

int verbosity

Verbosity level.

Possible values:

  • 100: Only fatal errors are displayed.
  • 101: Errors.
  • 102: Progress reports and errors (default).
  • 103: Informational messages.
  • 104: Debug messages.
